attributes.action: Seize assets held in the UK belonging to the US government equivalent to the value of the outstanding debt in respect of unpaid congestion charges incurred by their London embassy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government of the United States has repeatedly refused to pay the congestion charge in London despite the fact that US embassies in other countries pay similar charges. As the amount owed by the the US is greater than any owed by any other country the London authorities should therefore take positive action and seize US assets to a value equivalent of the outstanding debt.
